data.actual_result: It deletes the Discord server **and** crashes the Discord app
data.expected_result: It produces an error code and doesn't delete the server
data.short_description: Deleting a Discord server while connected to Voice Chat crashes app (**Must have 2FA enabled**)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you own - Open server settings - Open Overview - Click "Delete Server " - Type a 2FA code that's been used within the past minute or so?
